0.dialouge: Why hello there young boys, you guys are the students from Atheir Peak aren't you?

1.dialouge: I was wondering when one of you were planning to show up.

2.dialouge:
There are supposed to be a few other students here.~
You two wouldn't know where any of them are would you.

7.dialouge: Ahh!~You're named after the earth I see.

8.dialouge: Then you must come from the Everfrost Caverns!

9.dialouge: And how about you,~ the one in the glasses.

11.dialouge:
Malo...~
So you're named after the stars.

12.dialouge: I that case~ you came from around here.

14.dialouge: Klay and Malo~ it's pleasure to meet the both of you.

15.dialouge:
I bet you two two must be beat!~
So I'll stop yapping away and lead you to our dorms.
